memberdef.argsstring: (DFieldVparMu const fMaxwellian, double const mass, double const density, double const temperature, double const mean_velocity, double const magnetic_field)
memberdef.name: compute_maxwellian

briefdescription.para: Compute a Maxwellian distribution function. The Maxwellian distribution function is defined as Compute $fM(v,mu) = (2*PI*T)**1.5*n*exp(-E)$ with.

listitem.para: $n$ the density, $T$ the temperature and $u$ the mean velocity

$E$ the energy defined as $E = (0.5*(v-u)**2+mu*B)/T$.
fMaxwellian
A Maxwellian distribution function.
mass
Mass of the species.
density
A parameter that represents the density of Maxwellian.
temperature
A parameter that represents the temperature of Maxwellian.
mean_velocity
A parameter that represents the mean velocity of Maxwellian.
magnetic_field
Magnetic field.

briefdescription.para: Read the density, temperature and mean velocity required to initialise the Maxwellian in a YAML input file.

parameterdescription.para: Index range for the kinetic species
YAML input file

simplesect.para: an instance of Maxwellian distribution function.

memberdef.argsstring: (DFieldVx const fMaxwellian, double const density, double const temperature, double const mean_velocity)
memberdef.name: compute_maxwellian

briefdescription.para: Compute a Maxwellian distribution function. The Maxwellian distribution function is defined as $f_M(v) = n/(sqrt(2*PI*T))*exp(-(v-u)**2/(2*T))$ with $n$ the density, $T$ the temperature and $u$ is the mean velocity.

parameterdescription.para: A Maxwellian distribution function.
A parameter that represents the density of Maxwellian.
A parameter that represents the temperature of Maxwellian.
A parameter that represents the mean velocity of Maxwellian.

briefdescription.para: Read the density, temperature and mean velocity required to initialise the Maxwellian in a YAML input file.

parameterdescription.para: Index range for the kinetic species
YAML input file

simplesect.para: an instance of Maxwellian distribution function.

memberdef.argsstring: (DFieldVxVy const fMaxwellian, double const density, double const temperature, double const mean_velocity)
memberdef.name: compute_maxwellian

briefdescription.para: Compute a Maxwellian distribution function. The Maxwellian distribution function is defined as $f_M(v) = n/(sqrt(2*PI*T))*exp(-(v-u)**2/(2*T))$ with $n$ the density, $T$ the temperature and $u$ is the mean velocity.

parameterdescription.para: A Maxwellian distribution function.
A parameter that represents the density of Maxwellian.
A parameter that represents the temperature of Maxwellian.
A parameter that represents the mean velocity of Maxwellian.

briefdescription.para: Equilibrium operator as Maxwellian. This initialises all species.

detaileddescription.para: A class that initialises the distribution function as a Maxwellian.
